page.title: 12John Wilkinson School News
page.content: During the months of May and June 21 children aged 9 to 11 years took part in a{cycle course.}It has been teaching us to ride safely on the road. The test was on the 1st July 1985.There was a written test on the Highway Code and a cycling test around a certain course. Sometimes school events take place to raise money to take us on trips and to buy extra things like computers or musical instruments.In June the school held a {sponsored matchbox fill The winner got 242 objects in his matchbox. So far we have raised Â£270 for school funds. June 16th,the school held a{rounders {tournament}.Four schools took part.The John Wilkinson school was first and Hadley second,so they go to the finals to be held on July 10th in Broseley.
